QuestData.Title: Seeking Zin'jun
QuestData.Description: Rivett claims to have seen Zin'jun abandon ship with the rest of the survivors. That means he's still out there somewhere.$b$bWe can't leave him behind. He could be injured or worse yet, captured!$b$bGo track down Zin'jun and bring him back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Locate Zin'jun somewhere in the Ascent of the Swirling Winds.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Zin'jun in the Ascent of the Swirling Winds.
